name: Systems Limited
description: Systems Limited is one of Pakistan's oldest software houses, established in 1977. They specialize in enterprise digital transformation solutions, business process outsourcing, and technology consulting services. Systems Limited is listed on the Pakistan Stock Exchange and has multiple international certifications including CMMI Level 5.

locations.address: Plot No. 5, Sector 24, Korangi Industrial Area

name: 10Pearls
description: 10Pearls is a software development company that specializes in digital transformation, product development, and user experience design. Founded in 2004, they work with startups, mid-sized businesses, and Fortune 500 companies to create innovative digital solutions. They have a strong focus on emerging technologies like AI, machine learning, and blockchain.

name: Arbisoft
description: Arbisoft is a software services company specializing in web and mobile applications, AI solutions, and data analytics. Founded in 2007, they have grown to over 400 engineers working with clients around the world, including edX, Kayak, and Coca-Cola. They have a strong engineering culture and are known for their quality and reliability.

name: NetSol Technologies
description: NetSol Technologies is a global IT and enterprise software solution provider. Founded in 1997, they primarily serve the global asset finance and leasing industry with their flagship product, NFS Ascent. NetSol is publicly listed on NASDAQ and has a large campus in Lahore. They are one of the largest software exporters in Pakistan.

locations.address: NetSol IT Village, Lahore Ring Road

name: Gaditek
description: Gaditek is a technology company that builds and scales internet products. Founded in 2010, they operate in various sectors including cybersecurity, VPNs, and lead generation. Their flagship products include PureVPN, a leading VPN service. They have a strong focus on innovation and product development.

name: VentureDive
description: VentureDive is a technology solutions company specializing in digital product development and data solutions. Founded in 2012, they work with startups and enterprises across various industries. They were the development partner for Careem (now acquired by Uber) and have worked with major clients like Coca-Cola and the World Bank.

locations.address: 10th Floor, Pace Tower, M.M. Alam Road

name: Zameen.com
description: Zameen.com is Pakistan's largest real estate portal and one of the country's most successful tech startups. Founded in 2006, the company has grown into a major tech employer with a strong engineering team. They are part of the EMPG Group, which operates property portals across emerging markets.

name: Educative Inc
description: Educative is an interactive online learning platform for software developers. Founded in 2015 by Pakistani entrepreneurs, they have built a platform that allows authors to create and publish interactive courses. The company is headquartered in Seattle but maintains a significant engineering presence in Pakistan.

name: Confiz
description: Confiz is a technology services company specializing in retail, e-commerce, and enterprise solutions. Founded in 2005, they work with major global retailers and have expertise in Microsoft technologies, cloud solutions, and data analytics. They have a strong focus on quality and process excellence.

name: TechAbout
description: TechAbout is a software development company focused on web and mobile app development, UI/UX design, and digital marketing. They work with startups and established businesses globally, helping them build and scale their digital presence. The company has expertise in modern technologies like React, Node.js, and Flutter.
